short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paste text into multiple llm chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently supported chats: ChatGPT, ClaudeAI, Deepseek, Groq, Mistral, Gemini.

To use this extension, simply open all the chat tabs you're interested in and login. When you tap 'Paste' or press 'Enter', the text will be pasted into the respective chats input fields and will be submitted.
